text: inne-llezine amenu vehaceru vecahedu biemvalihim veenfusihim fi sebili-llahi vellezine evev venesaru ulaike ba`duhum evliyau ba`d. vellezine amenu velem yuhaciru ma lekum miv velayetihim min sey'in hatta yuhaciru. veini-stensarukum fi-ddini fe`aleykumu-nnasru illa `ala kavmim beynekum vebeynehum misakun. vellahu bima ta`melune besir
